Attributes.description: Examination of the different traditions of qualitative sociological inquiry and the associated methodological features used to study the interpretive practices and meanings in the everyday lives of individuals.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of SOCI 100, SOCI 101, SOCI 102 and SOCI 217.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 17:00, End Time: 18:30, Building: Mathematics, Room: Annex
